channel.title: Adding Slayer
channel.description:
Simple, all i need is to know
1.How to make it so u need a certain lvl of slayer to fight a monster 2.getting slayer xp by killing a monster
If you could answer those 2 questions, that would be real nice, rep ++ if ever :D
Thankx, ill visit later[br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 01:46:17 PM[/size][hr]no one is willing to help...

item.title: Adding Slayer
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok ok ok,

  1. public void slayerBanshee() if(playerLevel[18] >= W/e) { what ever you want to happen } else if(playerLevel[18] <= W/e) sendMessage("You Need A Slayer Level of _ to kill banshees"); ;

  2. same as before but where i put “whatever you want to happen”, add this somewhere,

addSkillXP(500, 18);

hope that helps. ill probably add more later i gots to go crash now.

Read full topic
